manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kids Mini Broom and Dustpan Set - Small Toddlers Broom for Boys and Girls, Toy Broom Cleaning Set Combo Why do we design this product? My daughter is getting more and more into the 'imitate everyone' phase, and she is obsessed with trying to help sweep, but can't handle a full-size broom. She runs around following mom and dad when they sweep the floor now learning how herself. Absolutely adorable and a great way to start early teaching cleanup skills! Children love to help out their parents and this small broom and dustpan set allows your little ones to pitch in with the housework. The broom stands upright when clipped into the dustpan to make it easy to store and there are a few colors to choose from. It's also super cute.Great Training Toy: The broom is not only a toy for toddlers, but also a good training tool for kids to know help their family do some housework.The broom cleaning set will let your babies learn to help their parents. Kid could use the broom set to clean corner and home floor.

broom and dustpan set for home & kids cleaning set This is a housekeeping cleaning training tools for kids, cultivate gadgets for children to help with housework. Let the child be a happy little helper Of course, this small broom and dustpan can be used for cleaning office work desk,pet nest,toilet,bathroom,bedroom,kitchen ect. This toddler broom and cleaning set are light and cute, and children will like it at first glance. When using it, it can promote parent-child relationship and enhance the children's interest and ability to do housework while playing. The small broom and dustpan set is guaranteed , but please pay attention to safety when assembling the broom for kids. If the product you received is missing or damaged, we will solve the problem for you as soon as possible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: Good quality broom and dustpan. Toddler uses daily to help with chores. Adorable product too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for little helper
reviews.reviewText: The little broom is perfect for a 2-year-old helper.It also saves the adult broom from being pushed instead of pulled, thereby damaging the bristles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Broom
reviews.reviewText: I did not buy this for a child. I bought this to travel with when I do comic cons as a vendor. The flooring tends to get dirty over the weekend, and I wanted something small, lightweight, but effective to quickly clean up small areas. Ignoring the child design, I liked that it came with a dustpan. It works great, and it's a real broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not so sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for 1 yr old. The dust pan is a little flimsy and lasted about a month after being dragged around. The broom is still intact. Overall I'm happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a bad item for the price, but could be a bit better.
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is 18 months and uses this off and on. It is honestly a bit short for her, and she is very tall for her age (99 percentile in height and weight), so perhaps it would fit up to a 3 year old easily. She loves to help with 'broam' after every meal :) and this is a useful substitute that doesn't potentially cause any issues for her tripping over it. She does struggle to use the dustpan, but she is quite young. Overall, I don't regret buying this, but if it were a bit taller and sturdier, it would be 100% a great buy. I'd rank it as a pretty good buy for your buck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Read their description, it is very small!
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my 1 & 5 yo. I didn’t read their description so was surprised at how short the handle length is. I would have returned the one for my 5 YO but he took to it and loves it. But definitely I’d recommend a different model/brand if you are buying for a pre-schooler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great broom toy
reviews.reviewText: purchased this for my grandson to sweep when he is wanting to help me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Broom for small camper!
reviews.reviewText: It may be a toy but it works great for a broom in a small space. The only drawback to it is the softness of the fibers. They flex a little too easily to force dirt out of crevices. I am not bothered by the little bear ears on it either lol
